settings.heading: How It Works
settings.text: At Table & Twine, we deliver fresh, local meals to people who value great food and convenience. When you partner with our award-winning culinary team, you won’t need to spend precious time mincing and measuring ingredients.
settings.text2: Instead, we’ll handle the tedious aspects of cooking for you. Our chefs will carefully curate exciting seasonal recipes, shop for fresh ingredients, and then get to chopping. When you receive your Charlotte dinner meal kit, you’ll just need to heat, garnish, and serve. In 15 minutes – or less – your family will be enjoying a delicious dinner together.

settings.title: Browse Seasonal Meals
settings.text: Unlike our competitors, we don’t import fruits and vegetables from foreign countries. Instead, we partner with local growers to ensure your grilled balsamic chicken with marinated tomatoes and cucumbers is super flavorful.

settings.title: Place Your Order
settings.text: Are you ready to enjoy a restaurant-quality meal in no time? Just place your Table & Twine order by 11:59pm before any of the designated order days to receive your meals the following days. For added convenience, you can either pick up your meals at our local kitchen or have them delivered.

settings.title: Untwine & Dine
settings.text: Our chefs take the drudgery out of dinner by doing all the planning, shopping, and chopping for you! You’ll just need 15 minutes to heat and plate your single meal entrée.

settings.section_heading: How To Shop With Table & Twine
We can help you take the hassle out of the holidays!
settings.section_text: If you dread hosting holiday get-togethers, order a chef-prepared meal kit from Table & Twine. Our easy-to-prepare dishes minimize prep and clean-up time, giving you more family time. We offer packages for Valentine’s Day, Mother’s Day, Thanksgiving, Christmas, and more!

settings.title: Chef-Prepared Recipes
settings.text: Dinner should be brilliant – not boring. That’s why our talented culinary team develops new, exciting recipes each week.

settings.title: Meals Ready in 15 Minutes
settings.text: Stop spending hours in the kitchen and instead spend just 15 minutes for each single entrée. At Table & Twine, our chefs handle the more time-consuming aspects of cooking so that you can make the most of your evening.

settings.title: Flexible Serving Sizes
settings.text: At Table & Twine, customers can order delectable dishes in serving sizes of one, two, and four. Of course, if you’re hosting more guests, you can always adjust the quantity of serving sizes.

settings.title: How does the ordering process work?
settings.text: For Charlotte customers, meals must be ordered by 11:59 pm the night before your desired pick-up/delivery date.

settings.title: What is your cancellation policy?
settings.text:
Charlotte customers must cancel orders no less than 24 hours before their scheduled pick-up/delivery date to receive a full refund with a 10% cancellation fee. If you cancel your order less than 24 hours before, no refund will be offered.

Food waste is an issue close to our hearts. So, rather than throw artfully-prepared meals in the bin, we’re always happy to deliver your Charlotte meal kit to a friend who can accept the order in your absence.

settings.title: Can I place an order over the phone?
settings.text: Unfortunately, no. All orders must be placed through our website. If you have any questions, reach out via the online Table & Twine Chat.

settings.title: Do you offer substitutions or changes to meals?
settings.text: No. We cannot make substitutions or changes to meals at this time.

settings.title: What’s included in the price?
settings.text: Each single-serving entrée and dessert feeds one person. Each kids’ meal feeds one child. Delicious pairings like salads, appetizers, and snacks have varying serving sizes that can be found in the product description.

settings.title: How do I prepare the meals?
settings.text: Preparing Table & Twine meals is quick and easy! Just scan the QR code on your meal’s packaging for heating instructions.

settings.title: Is there a delivery fee?
settings.text: Yes, delivery fees range from $6.99 to $9.99.

settings.title: What areas do you deliver to?
settings.text: We currently deliver to most locations in the greater Charlotte area. Type your zip code in the bar at the top of the page to see if we deliver to your address.

settings.title: How often does delivery or pick-up occur?
settings.text: For Charlotte customers, we currently offer delivery and pick-up on Tuesdays, Wednesdays, Thursdays, and Fridays. Meals can be picked up from 10am to 5:30pm. Our meals are delivered to your front porch between 10:00am and 5:30pm.

settings.title: What is the order cutoff time?
settings.text: Meals must be ordered by 11:59pm the night before your desired pick-up/delivery date. Order by Monday at 11:59pm to receive your meal on Tuesday. Order by Tuesday at 11:59pm to receive your meal on Wednesday. Order by Wednesday at 11:59pm to receive your meal on Thursday. Order by Thursday at 11:59pm to receive your meals on Friday.

settings.title: How far in advance can I order?
settings.text: Our menu updates every Friday morning.

settings.title: When are new menu items offered?
settings.text: Since we only use seasonal, farm-fresh ingredients, our culinary team reveals new weekly meals, appetizers, and desserts every season.

settings.title: Is there a minimum order size?
settings.text: We require a minimum order size of $40 for delivery and $25 for pick-up.

settings.title: I would like my delivery left somewhere other than my front door (e.g. side door). Can I send specific delivery instructions?
settings.text: Yes, we try our best to accommodate specific delivery instructions.

settings.title: How long do meals keep?
settings.text:
- Our prepared dinner meals, summer seasonal offerings, and kids’ meals keep for 3 to 5 days refrigerated.


- Bistro salads keep for up to 3 days.


- Desserts keep for 3 days. Frozen take and bake cookies keep for up to 1 month.


- Buffalo chicken dip, jumbo lump crab dip, and roasted red pepper hummus with vegetables keep for 3 to 5 days refrigerated.


- Local cheese and charcuterie, cheese and fruit plate, and guacamole and corn tortilla chips keep for 3 days refrigerated.


- Energy bites keep for 5 days refrigerated, or up to 2 months frozen. Egg cups keep for 3 to 5 days refrigerated. Smoothies keep for up to 1 month frozen.


- Drink mixes keep for 5 to 7 days refrigerated.

settings.title: How does Table & Twine promote sustainability?
settings.text:
Recycling & Upcycling
At Table & Twine, we’re committed to reducing our impact on the earth. You can help us by:

- Packing picnics or lunches in our insulated bags


- Re-freezing our ice packs for coolers


- Using our plastic containers for leftovers


- We’ll recycle our tote bags, ice packs, and cleaned plastic containers for you! Just drop them off at our local kitchen or leave them on your doorstep on your delivery day.



Less Food Waste

Table & Twine addresses food waste by pre-measuring all of the delicious ingredients used in your meal.

Smart Packaging

We’ve broken up with styrofoam! Instead, we use biodegradable products like paper boxes, bamboo trays, and more.

Heating Instructions

Our heating instructions are paperless. Just scan the QR code on your meal’s packaging, pour a glass of wine, and start cooking.

settings.title: How will my food stay cold?
settings.text: We use insulating packaging with ice packs to keep things chilly.

settings.title: What if my household avoids specific foods?
settings.text: We offer a variety of allergy friendly meal kit options in Charlotte.

settings.title: I have a discount code or gift card. How do I use it?
settings.text: You can use your discount code or gift card at checkout by simply typing the code or link you received into the “Gift or Discount Code” box and clicking “Apply.”

settings.title: What is your refund policy?
settings.text: We do not offer refunds for orders after the order cut-off time.

settings.title: What are your Mobile Message Service Terms & Conditions?
settings.text: Please click here for our Mobile Program Terms of Service.
